/**
 * Starts animation playback if needed.
 *
 * @remarks
 *
 * Starts animation playback if `animate` property is `true` and the animation is not yet running.
 *
 * @param data - The SpriteSpin instance data
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: applyAnimation

 * Gets a plugin state object by name.

 * @public
 */

/**
 * Initial frame number.
 *
 * @remarks
 *
 * This value is updated each frame and also represents the current frame number.
 */
members.name: frame

members.docComment:
/**
 * Number of frames for a full 360 rotation.
 *
 * @remarks
 *
 * If multiple lanes are used, each lane must have this amount of frames.
 */
members.name: frames
framesX
framesY
frameTime

members.docComment:
/**
 * The display height in pixels.
 *
 * @remarks
 *
 * Width and height should match the aspect ratio of the frames.
 */
members.name: height

 * The initial sequence number to play.
 *
 * @remarks
 *
 * This value is updated each frame and also represents the current lane number.
 */
members.name: lane
lanes

 * Use {@link registerPlugin} instead

members.docComment:
/**
 * Registers a plugin.
 *
 * @remarks
 *
 * Use this to add custom Rendering or Updating modules that can be addressed with the 'module' option.
 *
 * @param name - The name of the plugin
 *
 * @param plugin - The plugin implementation
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: registerPlugin

members.docComment:
/**
 * Resets the input state.
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: resetInput

members.docComment:
/**
 * Generates an array of source strings
 *
 * @remarks
 *
 * Takes a template string and generates an array of strings by interpolating {lane} and {frame} placeholders.
 * ```
 * sourceArray('http://example.com/image_{frame}.jpg, { frame: [1, 3], digits: 2 })
 * // gives:
 * // [ 'http://example.com/image_01.jpg', 'http://example.com/image_02.jpg', 'http://example.com/image_03.jpg' ]
 *
 * sourceArray('http://example.com/image_FRAME.jpg, { frame: [1, 3], digits: 2, framePlacer: 'FRAME' })
 * // gives:
 * // [ 'http://example.com/image_01.jpg', 'http://example.com/image_02.jpg', 'http://example.com/image_03.jpg' ]
 * ```
 *
 * @param template - The template string
 *
 * @param opts - Interpolation options
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: sourceArray
SourceArrayOptions
digits
frame
framePlacer
lane
lanePlacer
SpriteSpinCallback

/**
 * Describes a SpriteSpin plugin
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: SpriteSpinPlugin

members.docComment:
/**
 * Starts the animation playback
 *
 * @remarks
 *
 * Starts the animation playback and also sets the `animate` property to `true`
 *
 * @param data - The SpriteSpin instance data
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: startAnimation

members.docComment:
/**
 * Stops the running animation.
 *
 * @param data - The SpriteSpin instance data
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: stopAnimation

members.docComment:
/**
 * Updates the frame or lane number of the SpriteSpin data.
 *
 * @param data - The SpriteSpin instance data
 *
 * @param frame - The frame number to set
 *
 * @param lane - The lane number to set
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: updateFrame

members.docComment:
/**
 * Updates the input state using a mouse or touch event.
 *
 * @param e - The input event

 * @param data - The SpriteSpin instance data
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: updateInput
